00240 class BehaviorDrivenDesignTest : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00241 {
00242     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(BehaviorDrivenDesignTest);
00243     CPPUNIT_TEST(testGivenSetupCalled);
00244     CPPUNIT_TEST(testWhenOccursCalled);
00245     CPPUNIT_TEST(testThenEnsureThatCalled);
00246     CPPUNIT_TEST_EXCEPTION(testGivenThrowsLogicErrorWhenTwoGivensOfTheSameTypeAreDefined, std::logic_error);
00247     CPPUNIT_TEST_EXCEPTION(testGivenThrowsLogicErrorWhenInvalidGivenRequested, std::logic_error);
00248     CPPUNIT_TEST_EXCEPTION(testWhenThrowsLogicErrorWhenTwoGivensOfTheSameTypeAreDefined, std::logic_error);
00249     CPPUNIT_TEST_EXCEPTION(testWhenThrowsLogicErrorWhenInvalidGivenRequested, std::logic_error);
00250     CPPUNIT_TEST(testWorldCopyConstructor);
00251     CPPUNIT_TEST(testGivenWithOneArgumentConstructor);
00252     CPPUNIT_TEST(testWhenWithOneArgumentConstructor);
00253     CPPUNIT_TEST(testThenWithOneArgumentConstructor);
00254     CPPUNIT_TEST(testGivenWithTwoArgumentConstructor);
00255     CPPUNIT_TEST(testWhenWithTwoArgumentConstructor);
00256     CPPUNIT_TEST(testThenWithTwoArgumentConstructor);
00257     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00258

00260     void setUp()
00261     {
00262     }
00263 
00264     void tearDown()
00265     {
00266     }

00268     void testGivenSetupCalled()
00269     {
00270         World world;
00271 
00272         world.Given<TestGiven>();
00273 
00274         const TestGiven* testGiven = world.GetGiven<TestGiven>();
00275             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(true, testGiven->get_setup_called());
00276     }
00277 
00278     void testWhenOccursCalled()
00279     {
00280         World world;
00281 
00282         world.When<TestWhen>();
00283 
00284         const TestWhen* testWhen = world.GetWhen<TestWhen>();
00285             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(true, testWhen->get_occurs_called());
00286     }
00287

00289     {

00292         world.Then<TestThen>();

00295     }

00327     void testWorldCopyConstructor()
00328     {
00329         World world;
00330 
00331         world.Given<TestGiven>();
00332         world.When<TestWhen>();
00333 
00334         World worldCopy(world);
00335         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(worldCopy.GetGiven<TestGiven>() != NULL);
00336         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(worldCopy.GetWhen<TestWhen>() != NULL);
